controls.title: Controls
controls.idleHint: Click a key slot to rebind
controls.captureHint: Press any key, Esc to cancel, Backspace to clear

hasRod.0: Hey! Nice timing, I was just polishing my knife.
hasRod.1: Uh, hi. Can I fish now?
hasRod.2: Hey now... I ALREADY GAVE YOU A ROD! NOW SCRAM!!!

noRod.0: Hey! Nice timing, I was just polishing my knife.
noRod.1: Uh, hi. Can I fish now?
noRod.2: Ugh, fine. But you better not mess up my fishing spot!

goldenberries.name: Golden Berries
goldenberries.description: A rare, sweet berry that restores vitality.

tuna.name: Tuna
tuna.description: A common tuna fish. Delicious when prepared properly.

mackerel.name: Mackerel
mackerel.description: A sleek mackerel with shimmering scales.

cod.name: Cod
cod.description: A plump cod fish, common in temperate waters.

salmon.name: Salmon
salmon.description: A pink salmon, prized for its rich flavor.

catfish.name: Catfish
catfish.description: A whiskered catfish that lurks in deeper waters.

fat_tuna.name: Fat Tuna
fat_tuna.description: An exceptionally plump tuna. Worth more than its regular counterpart.

fat_mackerel.name: Fat Mackerel
fat_mackerel.description: A chunky mackerel with extra meat.

fat_cod.name: Fat Cod
fat_cod.description: An oversized cod, quite the catch!

fat_salmon.name: Fat Salmon
fat_salmon.description: A hefty salmon bursting with flavor.

fat_catfish.name: Fat Catfish
fat_catfish.description: A massive catfish. Its whiskers are impressively long.

coho_salmon.name: Coho Salmon
coho_salmon.description: A beautiful coho salmon with distinctive silver markings.

rickety_rod.name: Rickety Rod
rickety_rod.description: A worn fishing rod held together with hope and string.

fisherman_rod.name: Fisherman's Rod
fisherman_rod.description: A reliable fishing rod used by experienced anglers.

sea_grass.name: Sea Grass
sea_grass.description: A clump of sea grass. Not particularly useful.

boot.name: Old Boot
boot.description: A waterlogged boot. Someone lost this ages ago.

broken_bottle.name: Broken Bottle
broken_bottle.description: Shards of a broken glass bottle. Handle with care.

apple_core.name: Apple Core
apple_core.description: The remains of someone's snack. Very fresh, oddly.

trash_bag.name: Trash Bag
trash_bag.description: A soggy trash bag. Who throws these in the water?

sea_pickle.name: Sea Pickle
sea_pickle.description: A bioluminescent sea pickle. Kinda cute, actually.

broken_specs.name: Broken Spectacles
broken_specs.description: Someone's lost glasses. They probably can't read now.

infested_boot.name: Infested Boot
infested_boot.description: An old boot now home to mysterious sea creatures.

infested_vase.name: Infested Vase
infested_vase.description: An ancient vase covered in barnacles. Could be valuable!

ruined_chest.name: Ruined Chest
ruined_chest.description: A waterlogged treasure chest. Most contents have rotted away.

game.characterFallback: Failed to load character, using default
game.bannedMessage: You have been banned from Cute Fish With Knives.
game.afkMessage: You were disconnected for being idle. Reconnect when you are ready to play.
